{"id":863929225,"question_id":273,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2Â years, 2Â months","timestamp":1671741879,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/863929225/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to English Words","memory":"13.8 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    below_20 = [\"\",\"One\",\"Two\",\"Three\",\"Four\",\"Five\",\"Six\",\"Seven\",\"Eight\",\"Nine\",\"Ten\",\"Eleven\",\"Twelve\", \"Thirteen\", \"Fourteen\", \"Fifteen\", \"Sixteen\", \"Seventeen\",\"Eighteen\",\"Nineteen\"]\n\n    tens=[\"\", \"Ten\",\"Twenty\",\"Thirty\", \"Forty\",\"Fifty\",\"Sixty\",\"Seventy\",\"Eighty\",\"Ninety\"]\n\n    thousand=[\"\",\"Thousand\",\"Million\",\"Billion\"]\n    def numberToWords(self, num: int) -> str:\n        if num==0:\n            return \"Zero\"\n\n        word=\"\"\n        i=0\n        while num>0:\n            if num%1000!=0:\n                word=self.helper(num%1000)+self.thousand[i]+\" \"+word\n\n            i+=1\n            num=num//1000\n        return word.strip()\n\n\n    def helper(self,num):\n        if num==0:\n            return \"\"\n        elif num<20:\n            return self.below_20[num]+ \" \"\n        elif num<100:\n            return self.tens[num//10]+\" \"+self.helper(num%10)\n        else:\n            return self.below_20[num//100]+\" Hundred \"+self.helper(num%100)\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-english-words","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
